definitions.definition: the main or central point of something, especially of attention or interest:
examples: I think Dave likes to be the focus of attention.

definitions.definition: If you focus a device such as a camera or microscope, you move a device on the lens so that you can see a clear picture.
If you focus your eyes, or if your eyes focus, you try to look directly at an object so that you can see it more clearly:
examples: When they first took the bandages off, she/her eyes couldn't focus properly (= she couldn't see clearly).
